item.description:
COME ONE COME ALL TO THE NEW YEARS EVE BALL!

Friday December 31, 2010 @8pm Anthony's 105 Canal Street Malden MA

$20/person Downstairs ballroom/Large Dance Floor/Foyer with fireplace/Hot & Cold Hordouevres/ Great Music

FREE coffee & desserts/hats & noise makers

Get there early this event will probably sell out!

Proper dress required, please no jeans, sneakers, or hats

Tables can be reserved for you and your friends, and remember to sign up for a chance to get you and a friend in for free. Just e-mail Whatsangelodoing@comcast.net. Winners name will be posted at the door.
item.name: New Years Eve Ball, Malden MA
